document.masterDocTitle: New genera, species and records of Maeridae from Australian Waters: Austromaera, Ceradocus, Glossomaera, Hamimaera, Huonella gen. nov., Linguimaera and Maeraceterus gen. nov. (Crustacea: Amphipoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New genera, species and records of Maeridae from Australian Waters: Austromaera, Ceradocus, Glossomaera, Hamimaera, Huonella gen. nov., Linguimaera and Maeraceterus gen. nov. (Crustacea: Amphipoda)

bibRefCitation.author: Krapp-Schickel
bibRefCitation.refString: Krapp-Schickel, T. (2003) Linguimaera Pirlot, 1936 (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Melitidae), a valid genus. Memoirs of Museum Victoria, 60 (2), 257 - 283.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Linguimaera leo
Krapp-Schickel, 2003 : 272
, figs 10–12.—
Krapp-Schickel, 2008 : 22
. not
Megamoera mastersii
Haswell, 1879b : 265
, pl. 11, fig. 1.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 48.
Linguimaera leo Krapp-Schickel, 2004
, AM P.78422, north-west end of South Solitary Island, New South Wales. Image by Roger Springthorpe, Australian Museum.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type locality.
Prince George Light , Port Phillip Bay , Victoria , Australia ( 38°6.3´S 144°44.25´E ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution.
New South Wales
: Tathra, South Solitary Island (current study). Victoria : Port Phillip Bay, Western Port, Portland Bay ( Krapp-Schickel 2003 ). Tasmania : Apollo Bay; Simmonds Point; Sheppards Point; East Lippies (current study).
South Australia
: Robe; Wallaroo; Tiparra Bay; Flinders Island ; Beachport; Gulf of St Vincent; Yorke Peninsula; Sir Joseph Banks Group; Nuyts Archipelago; Ceduna ( Krapp-Schickel 2003 ).
Western Australia
: Bunbury, Favourite Island , Point Peron; Mullaloo; Port Gregory; Two Peoples Bay ( J.L. Barnard 1972a; current study ).
